type1_missing.reasoning: Statistics Bar showing Total tasks, Completed tasks, and Completion percentage is completely absent from dashboard page

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Task title validation allows maximum 50 characters instead of specified 100 characters
Session expiresAt timestamp set to current time instead of 7 days in future
Session cookie missing maxAge property for 7-day expiry
Tasks sorted by createdAt ASC (oldest first) instead of DESC (newest first) as specified
Password validation (minimum 6 characters) not performed on server-side during registration
Client-side password validation (minimum 6 characters) missing from registration form
Error responses use {error: string} format instead of specified {error: {code: string, message: string}} format

type3_extraneous.reasoning: Admin dashboard page with user statistics table not mentioned in specification
Priority dropdown selector (low/medium/high) not specified in requirements
Priority indicator badge display not specified in task item requirements
Priority parameter handling in POST endpoint not in API specification
Unused transaction functions clearCompletedTasks, deleteAllTasks, and toggleAllTasks defined but never called and no corresponding API endpoints or UI exist
